backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for a lottery coin system, defining all core types (users, lottery pools, tickets, transactions, withdrawals) and mixing in authorization and blob storage functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the Navbar component implements an admin-only 'Admin Panel' link navigating to /admin/dashboard with gold-and-dark theme styling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: A JSON-formatted reference document summarizing the purpose and key implementation details of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS stylesheet defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application file that sets up TanStack Router with all page routes (user and admin), auth guards, error boundaries, and the global layout with Navbar and ProfileSetupModal.
frontend/src/components/AdminActionLogsT: React component that fetches and displays a sorted table of admin action logs (block, unblock, role change) with badges, timestamps, and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/BlockUserModal.t: Modal dialog component that allows admins to block a user with an optional reason, calling the useBlockUser mutation and showing success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/CountdownTimer.t: A React countdown timer component that calculates and displays time remaining until a target bigint timestamp, updating every second and showing urgency styling when under one hour.
frontend/src/components/CreatePromotionD: A dialog form component for creating new promotions with fields for type, description, discount/bonus amounts, and start/end times, using the useCreatePromotion mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/CreditCoinsModal: A modal dialog that allows admins to credit a specified coin amount to a selected user via the useGrantAdminBonus hook, with quick-amount buttons and validation.
frontend/src/components/EditPromotionDia: A dialog form for editing an existing promotion's description, discount, bonus amount, and time fields, pre-populated from the promotion prop and submitted via useUpdatePromotion.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSpinner.t: Provides a reusable animated spinner component in three sizes and a full-page PageLoader wrapper centered on the screen.
frontend/src/components/LotteryCard.tsx: Displays a lottery's details (name, prize pool, ticket price, fill progress, draw time) in a card layout, using live stats from useGetLotteryLiveStats and badge helpers for draw interval and digit type.
frontend/src/components/Navbar.tsx: A sticky top navigation bar with logo, dynamic nav links based on auth state, an admin panel link for admin users, a coin balance display, and login/logout functionality via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/NumberPicker.tsx: A multi-digit number input component that renders individual digit boxes with keyboard navigation, backspace handling, and paste support, grouped visually with dashes.
frontend/src/components/PaymentProofUplo: A file upload component for payment proof images that supports drag-and-drop and click-to-upload, converts the file to base64, and shows a preview with a clear button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that prompts new users to enter a display name and email, then saves the profile via the backend actor, handling known errors like uninitialized accounts.
A styled banner component that displays promotion details (type, discount, bonus, description, expiry) with type-specific icons, labels, and color schemes.
frontend/src/components/QuickCreditCoins: An admin card component with a searchable user selector and amount input that allows instantly crediting coins to a selected user via the grantAdminBonus mutation.
frontend/src/components/TicketCard.tsx: Displays a single lottery ticket's details including ticket number, purchase date, and winner status with prize amount and a link to view results.
frontend/src/components/ToastContainer.t: A fixed-position toast notification container that renders success, error, and info toasts from the ToastContext with animated slide-in and dismiss buttons.
frontend/src/components/TransactionRow.t: Renders a single transaction row with an icon, label, amount, and date based on transaction type (win, buy_ticket, withdraw, bonuses, etc.). Supports navigation to related lottery pool pages via an external link icon.
frontend/src/components/UnblockUserModal: A confirmation dialog modal that allows admins to unblock a user by calling the useUnblockUser mutation, showing loading state and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: Provides authentication state and user profile management via React context, fetching the caller's profile from the backend actor and handling profile setup, errors, and re-fetching.
frontend/src/contexts/ToastContext.tsx: Provides a React context for managing toast notifications with success, error, and info variants, auto-removing them after 4 seconds.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication via AuthClient, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status through a React context and hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for backend interactions including user profiles, lottery pools, tickets, transactions, admin operations, and user management mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts (Playfair Display, Inter), sets up Tailwind base/components/utilities, defines CSS custom properties for a dark gold-themed design system, and adds custom utility classes and keyframe animations.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility module exporting a Tailwind class merger (cn), and formatting helpers for coin amounts, dates, time remaining, and draw interval labels/colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AddBalance.tsx: Page component allowing users to submit a coin balance top-up request by entering an amount and a payment screenshot URL, with quick-select amount buttons and a success confirmation state.
Admin dashboard page showing platform stats (revenue, users, lotteries, pending approvals) and quick-action links to key admin sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/BalanceRequests: Admin page for reviewing user balance top-up requests, with filterable tabs and approve/reject actions per request.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DrawDeclaration: Admin page for declaring lottery draw results by selecting an active lottery pool and entering a winning number, then displaying the resulting winners.
frontend/src/pages/admin/LotteryManageme: Admin page for creating and managing lottery pools, including a creation form with prize ratios and draw settings, and status update controls for existing pools.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Promotions.tsx: Admin page for managing promotions, allowing creation, editing, deactivation, and granting bonus coins to users, with a table listing all promotions and their statuses.
Admin page for listing, searching, blocking/unblocking users, assigning roles, and crediting coins via a modal.
frontend/src/pages/admin/WithdrawalManag: Admin page for viewing, filtering, approving, and rejecting user withdrawal requests with optional admin notes.
frontend/src/pages/BuyTicket.tsx: Page component for purchasing a lottery ticket for a specific pool, supporting manual or auto-generated ticket numbers, displaying applicable promotions/discounts, and enforcing per-user ticket limits and balance checks.
frontend/src/pages/DrawResults.tsx: Page component that displays the draw results for a specific lottery, showing the winning number, prize distribution stats, and a ranked winners list.
frontend/src/pages/Landing.tsx: Marketing landing page featuring a hero section, platform stats banner, and feature highlights for the LuckyCoins blockchain lottery platform.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page that authenticates users via Internet Identity, redirecting to the dashboard on success and displaying security info blurbs.
frontend/src/pages/LotteryList.tsx: Displays a searchable, filterable grid of active lottery pools fetched from the backend, with skeleton loading states and interval-based filter buttons.
frontend/src/pages/MyTickets.tsx: Shows the authenticated user's tickets in All/Won/Pending tabs with summary stats for total tickets, wins, and total winnings.
frontend/src/pages/Register.tsx: Registration page that uses Internet Identity login to create a new account, nearly identical to Login but with registration-focused copy and a welcome bonus note.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionHistory.ts: Displays the user's transaction history with summary stats (winnings, spent, bonuses) and tabbed filtering by transaction type, plus a description search input.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboard.tsx: User dashboard showing coin balance, active lottery count, and ticket summary cards with quick-action buttons for adding balance, withdrawing, and browsing lotteries.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawalRequest.tsx: Page component that allows users to submit coin withdrawal requests via UPI or bank transfer, and displays their withdrawal history with status badges.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters (including hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/src/utils/validation.ts: Collection of validation and formatting helper functions for email, password, amounts, ticket numbers, dates, coins, and password hashing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom color tokens (gold, charcoal, cream, sidebar, chart), typography, border radius, box shadows, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Tracks the full project state (version 17) for a lottery coin system with React/Node/MySQL stack, documenting architectural notes, existing features, known issues, and planned work including auth, wallet, lottery draws, admin panel, and bonus systems.
